TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogEntryCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type EventLogEntryCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 定義 執行個體集合的大小和列舉值。

span.span: Defines size and enumerators for a collection of instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，在讀取項目相關聯執行個體。Use the class when reading the entries associated with an instance. 屬性類別是事件記錄檔中的所有項目的集合。The property of the class is a collection of all the entries in the event log. 因為新的項目會附加至現有的清單中，逐步完成每個集合可讓您存取您最初建立之後所建立的項目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . 不過，您檢視整個清單之後，它不會更新與新的項目。However, after you view the entire list, it is not updated with new entries. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得事件記錄檔資訊從物件。The following example demonstrates how to obtain event log information from an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/CPP/eventlogentry_copyto.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/CS/eventlogentry_copyto.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_CopyTo/VB/eventlogentry_copyto.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從特定的陣列索引開始，將 的元素複製到 執行個體的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the to an array of instances, starting at a particular array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為新的項目會附加至現有的清單中，逐步完成每個集合可讓您存取您最初建立之後所建立的項目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . 陣列在具現化的時間固定的執行個體。An array of instances is fixed at the time it is instantiated. 因此，您無法使用所傳回的陣列來讀取新項目方法。Therefore, you cannot read new entries by using the array that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列，並使用方法，將複製的內容到其中。The following example creates an array and uses the method to copy the contents of an into it. summary.span: 取得事件記錄檔中的項目數目 (也就是 集合中項目的數目)。

span.span: Gets the number of entries in the event log (that is, the number of elements in the collection).

value.span: 目前在事件記錄檔中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of entries currently in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示動態的記錄檔中的所有項目清單。An represents a dynamic list of all the entries in a log. 因此，屬性可變更的存留期間您所建立的執行個體。Therefore, the property can change during the lifetime of the instance that you create. 通常最好使用是直接而不是它的值指派給變數的屬性。It is usually best to work with the property directly instead of assigning its value to a variable. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來逐一查看物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to iterate through an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CPP/eventlogentry_item.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CS/eventlogentry_item.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/VB/eventlogentry_item.vb#1)]

summary.span: 支援 物件的簡易反覆運算。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over the object.

returns.span: 可以用於逐一查看集合的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate over the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的物件方法是包裝函式可實作類別列舉值。The object that is returned by the method is a wrapper for the class that implements the enumerator. > [!NOTE] > 如果集合在反覆運算期間變更時，就會終止反覆項目。If the collection is changed during the iteration, the iteration is terminated. 若要避免這種可能性，請參閱替代方法來逐一查看集合的屬性。To avoid this possibility, see the property for an alternative technique for iterating through a collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 與事件記錄檔項目相關聯的以零起始之索引。

span.span: The zero-based index that is associated with the event log entry.

summary.span: 根據以 0 (零) 起始的索引來取得事件記錄檔中的項目。

span.span: Gets an entry in the event log, based on an index that starts at 0 (zero).

value.span: 位於 參數所指定位置的事件記錄檔項目。

span.span: The event log entry at the location that is specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會根據依時間先後順序送達的事件記錄檔中的事件記錄檔系統中編製索引。 objects are indexed by the event log system according to the chronological order in which they arrived in the event log. 使用屬性，以選取索引集合中的已知的特定事件記錄檔項目。Use the property to select a specific event log entry whose index in the collection is known. 逐一查看執行個體的逐步說明每循序物件。Iterating through the instance steps through each object sequentially. 是動態的集合和項目數目時就會進入迴圈，可能無法不變。The collection is dynamic and the number of entries may not be immutable when you enter the loop. 因此，您應該使用`for each...next`循環播放，而不是`for(int i=0; i檢查整個項目集的執行個體。Therefore, you should use a `for each...next` loop instead of a `for(int i=0; i instance to examine the entire set of entries. 因為新的項目會附加至現有的清單中，逐步完成每個集合可讓您存取您最初建立之後所建立的項目。Because new entries are appended to the existing list, stepping through the collection enables you to access the entries that were created after you originally created the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何顯示中的項目資訊物件。The following example demonstrates how to display information for the items in an object. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CPP/eventlogentry_item.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/CS/eventlogentry_item.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Item#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Item/VB/eventlogentry_item.vb#2)]
